Package mg.mapviewer.util

A collection of utility classes with different purposes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AltitudeProvider
    Provide an elevation value for a given position on the .hgt file basis.
    Assert
    Private Assert implementation.
    CC
    Utility for ColorConstants.
    Control
    An OnClickListener with some default functionality.
    DynamicListPreference
    Provide Dynamic List Preference for selection of a map file and selection of a theme.
    ExtrasUtil
    Utility for extra tasks
    Geoid
    Provides for a given point (latitude, longitude) a difference between wgs84 altitude and nmea altitude.
    GpxExporter
    Provides the ability to export a TrackLog to a GPX file.
    GpxImporter
    Provides the ability to import a TrackLog from a GPX file.
    LaLo
    Provide conversion between microdegree and degree
    MapViewUtility
    Utility for functionality related to the mapsforge MapView.
    MetaDataUtil  
    NameUtil
    Utility to determine the class name dynamically.
    Permissions
    Contains methos to check and request permissions.
    PersistenceManager
    Covers all handling towards the file system.
    PointModelUtil
    Utilities for PointModel.
    TopExceptionHandler
    Utility to catch uncaught exception and to protocol the in a stacktrace file.
    XmlTileSource  
    XmlTileSourceConfig  
    XmlTileSourceConfigReader  

Package mg.mapviewer.util Description

A collection of utility classes with different purposes.
